title: Sound: Secret Power, Hidden Force
body:
What if each of us is a finely tuned bell, ringing our own sound signature connected to multiple states of consciousness? Can we harmonize the hidden force of sound as a secret power and shift our vibration at will?

Journey through sound, the fundamental essence of existence. Understand the difference between vibration and frequency and how to transform and heal ourselves with sound’s connection to consciousness. Chants, mantras, singing bowls, and humming are all strategies to tune and tone our spiritual states and ultimately bridge realms … at the crossroads of modern research and ancient wisdom.
teaser: Can we harmonize the hidden force of sound and shift our vibration at will?
cast: Jonathan Goldman, Theresa Bullard-Whyke, Ph.D., Adam Apollo, Tony Nader, MD, Ph.D., JJ Hurtak, Ph.D., Ph.D., Caressa Ayres

title: Whispers of the Earth: Plant Consciousness
body:
Do plants speak the secret language of awareness, whispering knowledge and weaving connections to our Earth? Discover the science of superorganisms which are cosmic antennae with their own voice, healing humanity with melodies and music.

Listen to plants, the silent consciousness uniting all life. Flowers, trees, and fields exhibit unique anatomical and communication abilities to express agency and information. Roots, soil, pollen, and weather are all aspects of a supportive ecosystem teaching us about interconnected auditory understanding between species … at the crossroads of modern research and ancient wisdom.
teaser: Do plants speak the secret language of awareness, weaving connections to our Earth?
cast: Tigrilla Gardenia, Adam Curry, Veda Austin, Tony Nader, MD, Ph.D., JJ Hurtak, Ph.D., Ph.D., Teresa Helgeson

title: Beyond the Veil: The Illusion of Death
body:
How does the soul flow through lifetimes, and what do we carry with us?
 
Beyond the commonality of Near-Death Experiences, past-life regressions further confirm the continuity of life beyond the physical. Explore past-life review and pre-life agreements to understand the evolution of the soul.

Spirituality and science were once at odds concerning the veracity of life-after-death depictions. As more data comes forth and more people convey similar accounts, the divide between science and spirituality is blurring.

Science can no longer ignore what ancient cultures already knew about the afterlife … at the crossroads of modern research and ancient wisdom.
teaser: How does the soul flow through lifetimes, and what do we carry with us?
cast: Dannion Brinkley, Adam Apollo, Jeffrey Long, MD, Georgina Cannon, Theresa Bullard-Whyke, Ph.D., Tony Nader, MD, Ph.D.

title: Consciousness Made Real: The Thought Effect
body:
How does your mind interface with reality to alter the fabric of space and time?
 
Quantum physics is starting to give us an understanding of how the universe is conscious: from the observer effect to manifesting from the infinite possibilities of the quantum field.
 
Explore the connection between consciousness and the world around us as applied through the Maharishi Effect and the Intention Experiments of Lynne McTaggart. Delve into classified mind-over-matter research with Uri Gellar.
 
Through intentional thought coherence, it’s possible to override chaotic thought forms of reality to generate a more peaceful environment. But are we ready to step into a future where consciousness can influence our collective destiny?
teaser: How does your mind interface with reality to alter the fabric of space and time?
cast: JJ Hurtak, Ph.D., Ph.D., Desiree Hurtak, Ph.D., Adam Apollo, Adam Curry, Gregg Braden, Theresa Bullard-Whyke, Ph.D., Uri Geller, Lynne McTaggart

title: DMT: Portals of Perception
body:
Could naturally occurring DMT in the body be the key to unlocking humanity’s next step in conscious evolution and our place in the cosmos?

Opening these portals of perception may help us understand better ways to treat trauma, depression, and anxiety. 
 
Reports from those who have experienced DMT are startlingly similar. They either experience a dissolution of separateness into complete oneness, or they contact interdimensional beings with a higher level of consciousness.

Contact with beings in the DMT-verse may give us the information we need to solve some of the biggest problems our planet is facing … at the crossroads of modern research and ancient wisdom.
teaser: Could naturally occurring DMT in the body be the key to unlocking humanity’s next step in conscious evolution and our place in the cosmos?
cast: Jeff Holoubek, Paul Hynek, Daniel McQueen, MA, Ben Stewart

title: Sacred Geometry: Quantum Codes of Creation
body:
Is there a sacred code embedded in the fabric of the universe that guides the formation of all things?
 
From the quantum to the cosmic, the sacred language of the universe is geometry. Golden proportions and divine patterns can be found in the structure of DNA, the formation of the human body, and the configuration of galaxies. The foundational forms begin with the Platonic solids and repeat through the complex fractal patterns that give rise to all natural structures.
 
In essence, sacred geometry is the divine language that defines the core resonance of our 3D world… at the crossroads of modern research and ancient wisdom.
teaser: Is there a sacred code embedded in the fabric of the universe that guides the formation of all things?
cast: Desiree Hurtak, Ph.D., Gregg Braden, Theresa Bullard-Whyke, Ph.D., Dr. Elena Bensonoff, CPh, Dr. Tony Nader, MD, Ph.D.

title: Preview Season 2 of Divine Science
body:
SEASON 2 IS NOW LIVE!

In this new season of Divine Science, explore the extraordinary connections between mind, body, and spirit. From unlocking psychic potential and miraculous healing to journeys through lucid dreams, astral travel, and the power of the pineal gland — discover how science and spirituality intertwine to reveal the limitless potential within you.
teaser: In season 2 of Divine Science, unlock psychic potential and miraculous healing to journeys through lucid dreams, astral travel,

title: Divine DNA: Awaken Your Psychic Power
body:
Psychic abilities are encoded in your genetic makeup, but centuries of environmental and technological shifts have buried these capabilities. What can you do to unlock them in your DNA?

This season premiere of Divine Science embarks on a riveting exploration into the heart of our ancestral legacy, revealing that psychic phenomena are fundamental to human survival, embedded deep within your genetic code.

Push beyond the boundaries of conventional science with leading experts in genetics and neuroscience and uncover compelling evidence that DNA mutations have suppressed these once-crucial abilities.

Through a fusion of ancient wisdom and cutting-edge scientific research, this episode delves into the biological and energetic connections that could awaken these dormant powers, expanding your understanding of what is possible at the next frontier of consciousness.
teaser: Are psychic abilities encoded in your genetic makeup? Dive into the next frontier of consciousness.
cast: Uri Geller, Gregg Braden, Allyn Evans MBA, Brandy Gillmore, Helané Wahbeh N.D., MCR, Judith Pennington, Dean Radin, Adam Curry, Tim Tactical Advisor, Sarah Gamm

title: The Science of Miraculous Healing
body:
Shocking video evidence shows a woman’s tumor miraculously dissolving in real time. Is humanity on the verge of unlocking the science and secrets of quantum energy healing?

Cutting-edge bio-photon research and entanglement studies confirm that focused intention, coherent energy, and elevated emotions can alter DNA expression, enhance immune function, and shift cellular behavior — revealing a profound connection between consciousness and healing. Everyday people are now learning how to harness the quantum field of intelligence to recalibrate their body's frequency and restore the biofield to its original, perfected state.

For millennia, wisdom keepers, indigenous healers, and mystics have understood that the body heals through resonance. Is science finally proving what the ancients already knew?
teaser: Is humanity on the verge of unlocking the science and secrets of quantum energy healing?
cast: Brandy Gillmore, Adam Apollo, Gregg Braden, Shamini Jain, Garret Yount Ph.D., Dean Radin Ph.D.  Helane Wahbeh N.D., MCR

title: Channeling: Beyond Human Limitations
body:
Scientists have unearthed startling brainwave patterns by looking at brain scans during trance channeling. Discover how you can tap into your brain's hidden realms and shatter human limitations.

Research uncovers dramatic shifts in brain coherence, lexical density, and the foundational set point during channeling, revealing not just changes but a complete transformation of cognitive processes. This suggests untapped abilities that could redefine our human potential.

Dive into the rigorous application of scientific methods to mystical experiences, where we're not just bridging two worlds — we're challenging you to normalize the superhuman. 
Are you ready to venture into the mind's uncharted territories and break through to discover the true essence of being alive?
teaser: Discover how you can tap into your brain's hidden realms and shatter human limitations.
cast: Darryl Anka (Bashar), Sheila Gillette (THEO), Candice Sanderson, Helané Wahbeh N.D., MCR, Judith Pennington

title: Lucid Dreaming: Gateway to God Mode
body:
Groundbreaking research shows that lucid dreamers do more than wander awake in dreamland — they're revolutionizing waking reality. Learn how to tap into the highest level of lucid dreaming, “God Mode.”

Lucid dreaming is a transformational tool that unlocks deep-seated secrets of the subconscious, enabling mastery of skills and healing of trauma. Researchers and practitioners explore how you can evolve from a passive dreamer to a powerful architect of your dreams. Explore powerful techniques to harness the basics of simple awareness and to develop advanced lucid dreaming practices like creative God Mode.

This isn’t about navigating fantastical landscapes; it’s about radically reshaping your waking world. Are you ready to take the reins of your creator power and rewrite your life's script while you snooze?
teaser: Learn how to tap into the highest level of lucid dreaming, “God Mode.”
cast: Charlie Morley, Garret Yount Ph.D., Jade Shaw

title: Astral Projection: Ready to Ditch Reality?
body:
Astral projection isn’t woo-woo — it’s a neurological game-changer. And yes, you can do it. Learn how to tap into the next level of healing and transformation by leaving your body on purpose.

Cutting-edge neurofeedback has revealed something extraordinary. During out-of-body experiences, your brainwaves don’t spike — they go quiet. This isn’t fantasy. It’s science disrupting everything we thought we knew about consciousness.
And our ancient ancestors? They were light-years ahead. Egyptian, Vedic, and Indigenous mystics were using this practice to heal ancestral trauma, connect with the cosmos, and time travel, no EEGs required. Now, modern research is finally catching up.

Astral projection isn’t just a trip; it’s a portal to transformation. Are you ready to access your soul’s innate gifts, activate your energetic intelligence, and reclaim your spiritual power?
teaser: Astral projection isn’t woo-woo — it’s a neurological game-changer. And yes, you can do it.
cast: Jade Shaw, Adam Apollo, Tony Nader, MD, Ph.D., Desiree Hurtak, Ph.D., Judith Pennington

title: The Pineal Gland: Portal to 5D
body:
The pineal gland isn’t just an organ — it’s your built-in portal to the 5th dimension and beyond.

Once whispered about as the third eye, its power is now backed by emerging science. This tiny, pine-cone-shaped gland, hidden deep within the brain, is being revealed as a piece of highly advanced organic technology. Capable of regulating biology and expanding consciousness, this superorgan can activate abilities once thought to be reserved for mystics and masters.

With crystalline structures, light-sensitive receptors, and piezoelectric charge, experts share how the pineal is far more than a gland — it’s the seed of the soul, designed to transduce divine energy into human experience.

From ancient yogic traditions to modern neuroscience, this episode explores how inner techniques can awaken the pineal, stimulate natural DMT, and unlock soul-level awareness.

Are you ready to activate your unlimited perception?
teaser: Explore how inner techniques can awaken the pineal, stimulate natural DMT, and unlock soul-level 5D awareness.
cast: Tony Nader, JJ Hurtak, Ph.D., Ph.D., Desiree Hurtak, Ph.D., Helane Wahbeh, N.D., MCR, Gregg Braden

title: The Remote Viewing Revolution
body:
Remote viewing isn't just for military-trained assets. It’s for you. Discover how remote viewing works, why it was kept secret for decades, and how you can tap into the same innate ability. No clearance required.

Once buried in CIA files, remote viewing shattered the limits of perception. With the right training, anyone can access real intelligence across time, space, and dimensions using only consciousness.

In this mind-expanding episode, spies, scientists, and psychic operatives reveal the hidden history and the science of Project Stargate, a top-secret government program that ran for over 20 years. From tracking Soviet submarines beneath Arctic ice to pinpointing crash sites across the globe, the results were too accurate to ignore — and too paradigm-shifting to make public.

Your mind is the most powerful surveillance tool in history. Learn the secrets. Become a master.
teaser: Discover how remote viewing works, why it was kept secret for decades, and how you can tap into this innate ability now.
cast: Joseph McMoneagle, Russell Targ, Ph.D., Dean Radin, Ph.D.

title: Chakras: Reboot Your Soul
body:
The chakra system is quantum tech, hardwired into your body. Unlock it, and you’re not just evolving… you’re rewriting the human blueprint.

These energy centers are multidimensional gateways, linking your biology to the cosmos and your consciousness to the quantum field. Think power circuits, vibrational ports, and frequency dials — all transmitting intelligence across space, time, and dimensions.

In this episode, mystics, scientists, and experts reveal how each chakra fine-tunes your evolution, regulating everything from immunity to intuition, hormones to higher vision. From the serpentine rise of kundalini to the consciousness in your biofield, this isn’t just energy work. It’s a full-system reboot for your soul. Plug in. Turn on. And become the next version of human.
teaser: The chakra system is quantum tech, hardwired into your body. Unlock it, and you’re not just evolving… you’re rewriting the human blueprint.
cast: Adam Apollo, JJ Hurtak, Ph.D., Ph.D. Desiree Hurtak, Ph.D., Tony Nader, MD, Ph.D.
